interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Moisturizing Facial Emulsion for Restoring Hydrating Smoothing Skin from Manilla Natural Skincare
Review Date: 2020/12/27
Store: Manilla Natural Skincare
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Manilla Natural Skincare', 'Scent': 'Coconut', 'Item Form': 'Serum', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Fl Oz', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.5 x 1.5 x 5.9 inches; 2.19 Ounces'}
Review Text: The nudity facial emulsion absorbs quirkily and without leaving residue. With a lightly scented floral fragrance, it feels and smells refreshing. However, moisture is short lasting if you have dry prone skin and would recommend adding a longer lasting moisturizer if you need good moisture for an 8 hour day.
Review Title: light, fast absorbing
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Makeup Blender Sponge Set - 4 Pack Latex Free Q-Soft Makeup Beauty Foundation Blending Sponge Flawless Smooth Brush for Liquid Foundation BB Creams Powders Concealer (4 Pack)
FRESHME
{'Brand': 'FRESHME', 'Color': 'Ivory', 'Material': 'Rubber', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.6 x 3.6 x 1.4 inches; 1.59 Ounces', 'UPC': '681413196902', 'Manufacturer': 'FRESHME'}
I like the size and shape of these sponges, specially for application of foundation. I use liquid foundation and I noticed that the sponge was soaking up the makeup. I started using these only to apply powdered makeup like rouge or shimmer and they work very well.
good for powder but not liquid makeup
Manicure and Pedicure Nail Clipper from POWERGROOMING - Powerful Trimmer for Thick and Thin Finger Nails and Toe Nails - Included Nail File and"Catcher" for Easy Cleanup (1 Pack)
POWERGROOMING
{'Brand': 'POWERGROOMING', 'Material': 'Stainless Steel', 'Blade Edge': 'Straight', 'Blade Material': 'Stainless Steel', 'Target Audience': 'Women, Men', 'Package Dimensions': '3.8 x 1.3 x 1 inches; 3.21 Ounces', 'UPC': '653233212735', 'Manufacturer': 'POWERGROOMING'}
This has been one of my favorite nail clippers I have used. It cuts with precision, even toenails that are thick or semi ingrown. curvature of clip is wide so it will not clip nails leaving edges, and you do not have to use more than once per nail except toe nail. I also like the little case that does with it and the curved body gives thumb more leverage to hold in place when clipping. It comes with a nail filer but I didn't find much use for it.
Strong clipping power, case is great for traveling
Grinding Away Skin Polishing Scrub, 3 fl. oz., Polishing Scrub Works to Improve Skin's Texture and Tone by Buffing Away Dead Skin Cells by Higher Education Skincare
Higher Education
{'Brand': 'Higher Education', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Product Benefits': 'Smoother', 'Material Feature': 'Gluten Free, Cruelty Free', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.59 x 3.58 x 1.61 inches; 3 Ounces', 'UPC': '811381031008'}
Although the Higher Education facial scrub has a bit of a chemical induced rather than fragrant smell, its texture and cleansing power is great at getting rid of dead skin cells and dull patches. My skin feels refreshed and truly soft after using, without need to resort to facial cloths to do the scrubbing. A double pea size amount goes a long way for scrubbing face and neck, so amount will last a long while. 4/5.
Pleased with scrubbing properties, smells a little chemically
Moisturizing Facial Emulsion for Restoring Hydrating Smoothing Skin from Manilla Natural Skincare
Manilla Natural Skincare
{'Brand': 'Manilla Natural Skincare', 'Scent': 'Coconut', 'Item Form': 'Serum', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Fl Oz', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.5 x 1.5 x 5.9 inches; 2.19 Ounces'}
The nudity facial emulsion absorbs quirkily and without leaving residue. With a lightly scented floral fragrance, it feels and smells refreshing. However, moisture is short lasting if you have dry prone skin and would recommend adding a longer lasting moisturizer if you need good moisture for an 8 hour day.
light, fast absorbing
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Makeup Preferences:**
  - Prefers products for powdered makeup application, facing challenges with liquid makeup, particularly regarding absorption by tools.

- **Product Characteristics:**
  - Values ergonomic designs in makeup applicators and grooming tools for enhanced usability and control.
  - Chooses latex-free materials, indicating sensitivity or a preference for hypoallergenic options.

- **Performance Expectations:**
  - Expects makeup tools to minimize excessive product absorption and seeks multifunctional products suited for different makeup types.
  - Recently engaged with skincare products aimed at improving skin texture and tone, showcasing an interest in effective personal grooming solutions.

- **Brand Engagement:**
  - Shows loyalty and preference for specific brands, particularly in skincare where recent interactions reflect a focus on product usability.

- **Personal Grooming Preferences:**
  - Exhibits a strong interest in well-designed grooming tools that emphasize efficiency and precision, having positive experiences with high-quality grooming products.
  - Values practical features such as ergonomic design in skincare and grooming tools for better control and convenience.

- **Recent Skincare Interaction:**
  - Recently reviewed a facial emulsion, noting its light, fast-absorbing nature, and refreshing scent. The user expressed a need for more lasting moisture, highlighting a discerning approach to hydration products suitable for sensitive skin. 

Overall, the user maintains a thoughtful approach to personal grooming, focusing on practicality, performance, and effective application, with a demonstrated interest in high-quality skincare options.
